Question: Zhejiang Trefan Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Zhejiang Trefan Technology Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Exhibited products: Bluetooth speaker, headphones, earbuds, and soundbar
- Strong R&D team with 40 experienced engineers for acoustic, in-house PCB, and graphics design
- 40,000m2 production bases in Hengdian, Jiangxi
- 40 RD and engineering staff for product design and development
- Factory qualified for ISO 9001: 2015, ISO 14001: 2015, IATF 16949: 2016 as well as BSCI
